text: Nɨbi bɨ bin sek mɨdebɨm okok abe, gos tep ak kɨdek gɨl bin nɨbi okok ayɨp mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb. Kɨli bɨ tek kɨles ma mɨdebal ak nɨm, kɨlop dɨtep gɨnɨmɨb. God nɨbop bɨ okok abe, kɨlop bin okok abe yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek, ayɨp pelpel mɨdtep gɨnɨgabɨm. Anɨb ak nɨbi bɨ okok, bin nɨbi okok kɨli teplep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl yɨb mɨdebal agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgɨpɨm ak, nɨbi God ayɨp agɨnɨg, tap olap nɨbop gep tek ma lɨnɨgab.
